title: Slate, Wyn and Me
creator_credit: Ukiyo Films, Tom Burstall and Don McLennan
brief_description: Having robbed a bank and killed a policeman, two brothers kidnap a girl who witnessed it all. Based on the novel, ” Slate and me and Blanche McBride” by Georgia Savage. Stars Sigrid Thornton, Simon Burke and Martin Sacks.
creator_credit_for_label: Ukiyo Films, Tom Burstall and Don McLennan
description: Having robbed a bank and killed a policeman, two brothers kidnap a girl who witnessed it all. Based on the novel, ” Slate and me and Blanche McBride” by Georgia Savage. Stars Sigrid Thornton, Simon Burke and Martin Sacks.
